# Practical 7

This folder contains the practical 7 codes

## Compile

```bash
gcc -lm PolynomialEvaluation.c -o PolynomialEvaluation
``` 

## Execute:

```bash
./PolynomialEvaluation
```

## Compile

```bash
gcc -lm Pointer.c -o Pointer
``` 

## Execute:

```bash
./Pointer
```
